Uses of Interface
de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.Overlayable

Packages that use Overlayable
de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics Anything that relates to the graphical user interface of Siafu is contained in this package. 
de.nec.nle.siafu.model This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects. 
 

Uses of Overlayable in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics
 

Methods in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics with parameters of type Overlayable
 void Painter.requestOverlayDrawing(Overlayable ov)
          Called by the controller, this method draws the overlay on top of the background, and keep the image ready to be painted on the canvas instead of the background.
 void GUI.requestOverlayDrawing(Overlayable ov)
          Request that the GUI draw an overlayable on top of the background.
 

Uses of Overlayable in de.nec.nle.siafu.model
 

Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.model that implement Overlayable
 class BinaryOverlay
          A binary overlay returns a BooleanType object (a publishable boolean) set to true or false depending on whether the value at a given postion is above or below a unique threshold.
 class DiscreteOverlay
          A discrete overlay returns it's value as a Text object according to the provided thresholds.
 class Overlay
          An overlay is in essence a matrix which maps a value to each position of the simulated world.
 class Place
          Places define a position in the simulated world.
 class RealOverlay
          A real overlay does not perform any mapping between the matrix values and the returned value.
